snippet: “Noli Me Tangere” is based on a 19th-century novel by the nationalist José Rizal that explores the inequities in his country during Spanish colonization.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Felipe Padilla de Leon opera Noli Me Tangere at Kaye Playhouse at Hunter College.
lead_paragraph: “Noli Me Tangere” is based on a 19th-century novel by the nationalist José Rizal that explores the inequities in his country during Spanish colonization.

headline.seo: ‘Noli Me Tangere,’ at the Kaye Playhouse
